arts.ttl: Fabrizio Romano Transfer News: Arsenal in striker TALKS, Chelsea SWAP latest, Rashford Man Utd EXIT
arts.sum: Fabrizio Romano has provided some massive updates on the biggest transfer stories from around Europe, including Arsenal's plan to add a striker this month, Chelsea's ongoing talks with Bayern Munich over a potential swap deal involving Christopher Nkunku and Barcelona's interest in Man Utd wantaway Marcus Rashford . arts.ttl: Gavi: Barcelona's Yamal best in world after Messi
arts.sum: Barcelona midfielder Gavi says Lamine Yamal is the best player in the world after Lionel Messi following the teenager's devastating showing in Wednesday's 5-1 Copa del Rey win over Real Betis.

arts.ttl: Barcelona star speaks out on Ronald Araújo’s future after win over Real Betis
arts.sum: Barcelona star Gavi has this evening spoken out on the future of teammate Ronald Araújo. This of course comes in the midst of a chaotic week, which has seen the…

arts.ttl: Barcelona advance to Copa del Rey quarterfinals with 5-1 win over Real Betis
arts.sum: Gavi and Jules Koundé scored a goal each in the first half-hour and Raphinha, Ferran Torres and Lamine Yamal added to the lead in the second half to give the Catalan club the win and a spot in the quarterfinals. Barcelona followed up its rout of Real Madrid in the Spanish Super Cup final with a comfortable 5-1 victory over Real Betis in the round of 16 of the Copa del Rey on Wednesday.

arts.ttl: Lamine Yamal managed a personal feat for the first time in his career in Barcelona 5-1 Real Betis
arts.sum: A surprising statistic surrounding the production of Barcelona star Lamine Yamal has come to the fore on Wednesday evening. This comes owing to the Spaniard’s latest performance in Blaugrana colours.…

arts.ttl: Barcelona eases into Copa del Rey quarterfinals with 5-1 rout of Real Betis
arts.sum: Gavi and Jules Koundé scored a goal each in the first half-hour and Raphinha, Ferran Torres and Lamine Yamal added to the lead in the second half to give the Catalan club the win and a spot in the quarterfinals. Barcelona followed up its rout of Real Madrid in the Spanish Super Cup final with a comfortable 5-1 victory over Real Betis in the round of 16 of the Copa del Rey on Wednesday.

arts.ttl: Vitor Roque labels Barcelona ‘the best team in the world’ after scoring in Real Betis’ Copa defeat
arts.sum: On-loan Barcelona star Vitor Roque was quick to pay his respects to his parent club on Wednesday evening. This comes after Roque’s Real Betis were taught something of a lesson…

arts.ttl: WATCH: Vitor Roque scores against parent club Barcelona as Real Betis score consolation
arts.sum: It is not to be a perfect evening for Barcelona, as they have been unable to keep a clean sheet against Real Betis in their Copa del Rey last 16 tie – the visitors have conceded on five occasions, although they at least have a small moment of joy now. arts.ttl: Photo: Barcelona were denied a goal by maybe the tightest offside call ever vs Real Betis
arts.sum: Barcelona were this evening on the receiving end of one of the most remarkable offside calls in recent memory. This came during the Blaugrana’s meeting with Real Betis. Hansi Flick’s…

arts.ttl: WATCH: Super sub Ferran Torres scores Barcelona’s fourth against Real Betis
arts.sum: Barcelona are looking back to their best under Hansi Flick, and their start to 2025 is getting better and better as they now lead Real Betis 4-0 in the Copa del Rey last 16 tie at the Estadi Olimpic.
